title: Chernobyl
review: A harrowing, meticulously crafted look at one of history's greatest man-made disasters. The tension is palpable from the first frame to the last.

title: Marty Supreme
review: Absolutely electric. A stylized, high-energy character study that captures a unique rhythm. Easily one of the most vital watches of the year.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
review: Visually unparalleled and a total immersion into Pandora. While the world-building is unmatched, it definitely feels like a bit of a slow watch in the middle act.
